script:
{
"@context": "http://www.schema.org",
"@type": "LocalBusiness",
"@id": "https://www.pujarambh.com/",
"url": "https://www.pujarambh.com/",
"name" : "Pujarambh",
"description" : "We provide online Pandit ji along with complete solution for prayers and worship at affordable costs ",
"logo": "https://www.pujarambh.com/images/logo.svg",
"address":
{
"@type" : "PostalAddress",
"addressCountry" : "IN",
"addressLocality" : "Sanjay Gandhi Transport Nagar",
"addressRegion" : "Delhi",
"postalCode" : "110042",
"streetAddress" : "CW-593, opposite Indian Oil Petrol Pump"
},
"telephone" : "+91-9870405987",
"email": "connect@pujarambh.com",
"image" : "https://www.pujarambh.com/images/logo.svg",
"sameAs" :
[
"https://www.facebook.com/Pujarambh",
"https://twitter.com/pujarambh",
"https://www.linkedin.com/in/pujarambh-the-beginning-092877207/",
"https://www.instagram.com/_pujarambh_/"
],
"priceRange" : "$5 - $3000",
"@graph":
[
{
"@context":"http://schema.org",
"@type": "Product",
"aggregateRating": { "@type": "AggregateRating", "ratingValue": "5", "reviewCount": "1" },
"description": " Vasant Panchami, also known as Basant Panchami in India is celebrated because the festival of deity Saraswati. Ma Saraswati Puja is done on the day of Vasant Panchami.
No of Pandit(s) : 1 | Duration : 1 hrs | Puja Samagri Included in the package
",
"name": "Saraswati Puja",
"sku": "Pujarambh-1",
"brand": "Pujarambh",
"mpn": "1562633",
"image": "https://www.pujarambh.com/images/product/1612875312552-saraswati-puja - Copy.jpg",
"offers": {
"@type": "Offer",
"availability": "https://schema.org/InStock",
"price": "2900",
"priceCurrency": "INR",
"url": "https://www.pujarambh.com/product/saraswati-puja",
"priceValidUntil": "18 November 2021"
},
"review":[
{
"@type": "Review",
"author": "Amit Khare",
"datePublished": "18 November 2021",
"reviewBody": "The best product I had for my family.",
"name": "Pujarambh Customer",
"reviewRating": {
"@type": "Rating",
"bestRating": "5",
"ratingValue": "5",
"worstRating": "0"
}
}
]
},
{

"description": " Ganesh Puja is performed for Lord Ganapathi who removes all the obstacles and negative energies. This puja bestows one with victory, brings harmony in family and helps one succeed in life.

",
"name": "Ganesh Puja",
